pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Model Selection Approach for Parsimonious Gaussian Mixture Models // Model-based clustering using Bayesian parsimonious Gaussian mixture models. MCMC (Markov chain Monte Carlo) are used for parameter estimation. The RJMCMC (Reversible-jump Markov chain Monte Carlo) is used for model selection. GREEN et al. (1995) doi:10.1093/biomet/82.4.711.
